channel.title: RSPS - Sorry to say but
channel.description:
You guys aren't really helping me when I drastically need it.. it's fine though,I perfectly understand an helpful community.
Thanks :(

item.title: RSPS - Sorry to say but
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

If you ask questions that could be solved by using the search form or a quick Google then people probably won’t go out of their way to help you. If you ask a reasonably complex question there is no one intelligent enough to help you, that regularly browses the help section. If you download a poorly written and overused source such as DeltaScape or Project Insanity which at least 80% of the forum uses then you can probably expect you will get some help.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS - Sorry to say but
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

ahhh wait,im being confused,btw Im using bluurs,my bad
And yes,I want ppl to log on,secondly,just to get this straight,I have the gui ip set to my no-ip,

i try to log on…won’t let me,

now in the source files,i set everything ,EVERYTHING to 127.0.0.1 ,i try to log on,it wont let me,and if i cant log on,my friends cant log on

EDIT* Why is this so difficult for me…Everyone else has it easy…

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS - Sorry to say but
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

SET THEM TO 127.0.0.1 IF ONLY YOU WANT TO GO ON, IF YOU WANT OTHERS TO GO ON USE THE NO-IP!

THEN PORTFORWARD SO PEOPLE CAN JOIN

item.title: RSPS - Sorry to say but
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

I see what your saying,and yeah,I want to play Viral.
So this is what I’m trying to solve.
So far,In the client(The one you PLAY on)The GUI in there has the IP set to my no-ip,I think that’s right,correct me if I am wrong please,

Furthermore,In the source files,something has to be changed,now everything in the source files is set to 0.0.0.0,the "client file IN the source files have the ip set to 0.0.0.0,and there’s two thins set to that in that file,strange…
NOW going into the source files even more,I found the server file,which has to have the ip changed,which is set to 0.0.0.0 atm,All the ports are set to 43594,I have portforwarded,I have a no-ip,everything,So this is my last step,hope this cleared things up

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS - Sorry to say but
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

DannyIsSoPro:

Woah,ok so,every single file that reuires that text, should be set to 0.0.0.0? For example,the client file and server file have to be set to 0.0.0.0 right?

uh.
I dont know what your asking.

You only ever need to change the IP in your CLIENT files.
0.0.0.0 is you want to play locally, and if you wish to give others your client, you must set the ip to yours.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS - Sorry to say but
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

DannyIsSoPro:

Thanks for replying ,and yes I know theyre in there but,which Ips should I put in there,like,I know for GUI,I put my no-ip, but what about the source files that need the ip changed in them?

Your source files do not require an ip to be set.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS - Sorry to say but
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“DannyIsSoPro, post:1, topic:385503”]You guys aren’t really helping me when I drastically need it… it’s fine though,I perfectly understand an helpful community.

Thanks :([/quote]

The server help section isnt monitored every second of the day.

Only like 5-6 members actively respond to help threads.

Also, if you post something like:

[quote=“DannyIsSoPro, post:1, topic:385498”]OKAY PEOPLE,THIS IS MY THIRD POST…I AM BEGGING YOU… PLEASE HELP ME OUT…
WHAT I AM TRYING TO DO IS FIXING MY RSPS SO OTHER PEOPLE CAN LOG ON,I CAN LOG ON BUT THEY CANT’…
PLEASE PEOPLE…IM PLEADING…I DON’T WANT MY FIRST RSPS DREAMS TO BE CRUSHED

I AM TRYING TO FIND OUT WHAT TO SET THE IP’S TO IN THE CLIENT AND SOURCE FILES.

PLEASE ,THIS IS MY LAST STEP TO GETTING MY RSPS ONLINE…IF YOU DO THIS FOR ME,I CAN’T THANK YOU ENOUGH…

YOURS,DANNY…:([/quote]

It annoys me, just reading it.

The answer to your question in client.java (Search server = ) and gui.java in your client files.

Read full topic
